pr_title: Beacon beam rendering and other be renderers

timeline.message: Beacon beam rendering and other be renderers

timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -18,6 +18,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1767 net/minecraft/util/DyeColor
 	METHOD method_7786 byFireworkColor (I)Lnet/minecraft/class_1767;
 		ARG 0 color
 	METHOD method_7787 getColorComponents ()[F
+		COMMENT Returns the red, blue and green components of this dye color.

replies.bodyText: Yep, I checked with some dye color values
replies.author: YanisBft

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe these to fill the missing parameters on this method?
ARG 4 heightScale
ARG 7 beamSegment
ARG 8 segmentHeight
ARG 9 color
ARG 10 innerRadius
ARG 11 outerRadius
timeline.author: Tom-The-Geek
